name: Bulbasaur
desc: Bulbasaur is a dual-type Grass/Poison Pokémon. It's known for the plant bulb on its back.

name: Ivysaur
desc: Ivysaur is the evolved form of Bulbasaur. It continues to grow the plant on its back.

name: Venusaur
desc: Venusaur is a fully evolved Grass/Poison-type Pokémon. It can Mega Evolve and Gigantamax for even greater power.

name: Charmander
desc: Charmander is a Fire-type Pokémon with a flame at the end of its tail.

name: Charmeleon
desc: Charmeleon is the evolved form of Charmander. It has a fiery personality and breathes fire.

name: Charizard
desc: Charizard is a Fire/Flying-type Pokémon. It has multiple forms, including Mega Evolutions and Gigantamax.

name: Squirtle
desc: Squirtle is a Water-type Pokémon known for its water cannons on its back.

name: Wartortle
desc: Wartortle is the evolved form of Squirtle. It has powerful water-based attacks.

name: Blastoise
desc: Blastoise is a Water-type Pokémon known for its powerful water cannons. It can Mega Evolve and Gigantamax.

name: Caterpie
desc: Caterpie is a Bug-type Pokémon. It's often found munching on leaves.

name: Metapod
desc: Metapod is the evolved form of Caterpie. It has a tough shell but limited mobility.

name: Butterfree
desc: Butterfree is a Bug/Flying-type Pokémon known for its graceful wings. It can also Gigantamax to become even more majestic.

name: Weedle
desc: Weedle is a Bug/Poison-type Pokémon. It's often found in forests and fields.

name: Kakuna
desc: Kakuna is the evolved form of Weedle. It's in a cocoon-like state and can't move much.

name: Beedrill
desc: Beedrill is a Bug/Poison-type Pokémon known for its sharp stingers. It can Mega Evolve for increased power.

name: Pidgey
desc: Pidgey is a Normal/Flying-type Pokémon. It's common and known for its gentle nature.

name: Pidgeotto
desc: Pidgeotto is the evolved form of Pidgey. It has strong wings and can fly long distances.

name: Pidgeot
desc: Pidgeot is a Normal/Flying-type Pokémon with powerful wings. It can Mega Evolve for increased abilities.

name: Rattata
desc: Rattata is a Normal-type Pokémon known for its quickness and sharp teeth.

name: Raticate
desc: Raticate is a Normal-type Pokémon. It's the evolved form of Rattata.

name: Spearow
desc: Spearow is a Normal/Flying-type Pokémon. It's small but has a sharp beak.

name: Fearow
desc: Fearow is a Normal/Flying-type Pokémon. It has a long neck and powerful beak.

name: Ekans
desc: Ekans is a Poison-type Pokémon known for its coiled body.

name: Arbok
desc: Arbok is a Poison-type Pokémon. It's the evolved form of Ekans.

name: Pikachu
desc: Pikachu is an Electric-type Pokémon known for its cuteness and electrical abilities.

name: Raichu
desc: Raichu is an Electric-type Pokémon. It's the evolved form of Pikachu.

name: Sandshrew
desc: Sandshrew is a Ground-type Pokémon known for its tough skin.

name: Sandslash
desc: Sandslash is a Ground-type Pokémon. It's the evolved form of Sandshrew.

name: Nidoran♀
desc: Nidoran♀ is a Poison-type Pokémon known for its cautious nature.

name: Nidorina
desc: Nidorina is the evolved form of Nidoran♀. It's gentle but can be fierce when provoked.

name: Nidoqueen
desc: Nidoqueen is a Poison/Ground-type Pokémon. It's a powerful and nurturing queen.

name: Nidoran♂
desc: Nidoran♂ is a Poison-type Pokémon known for its pride.

name: Nidorino
desc: Nidorino is the evolved form of Nidoran♂. It's easily angered and very proud.

name: Nidoking
desc: Nidoking is a Poison/Ground-type Pokémon known for its strength and ruthlessness.

name: Clefairy
desc: Clefairy is a Fairy-type Pokémon known for its moon-like appearance.

name: Clefable
desc: Clefable is a Fairy-type Pokémon known for its rare and enchanting presence.

name: Vulpix
desc: Vulpix is a Fire-type Pokémon known for its six orange tails.

name: Ninetales
desc: Ninetales is a Fire-type Pokémon known for its mystical powers. It's the evolved form of Vulpix.

name: Jigglypuff
desc: Jigglypuff is a Normal/Fairy-type Pokémon known for its lullaby-like singing.

name: Wigglytuff
desc: Wigglytuff is a Normal/Fairy-type Pokémon. It's the evolved form of Jigglypuff.

name: Zubat
desc: Zubat is a Poison/Flying-type Pokémon known for its nocturnal habits.

name: Golbat
desc: Golbat is a Poison/Flying-type Pokémon. It's the evolved form of Zubat.

name: Oddish
desc: Oddish is a Grass/Poison-type Pokémon. It's known for its leaves and vibrant colors.

name: Gloom
desc: Gloom is the evolved form of Oddish. It emits a foul odor.

name: Vileplume
desc: Vileplume is a Grass/Poison-type Pokémon. It's known for its large, captivating petals.

name: Paras
desc: Paras is a Bug/Grass-type Pokémon. It's a small, mushroom-like creature.

name: Parasect
desc: Parasect is a Bug/Grass-type Pokémon. It's the evolved form of Paras.

name: Venonat
desc: Venonat is a Bug/Poison-type Pokémon known for its large eyes.

name: Venomoth
desc: Venomoth is a Bug/Poison-type Pokémon. It's the evolved form of Venonat.

name: Diglett
desc: Diglett is a Ground-type Pokémon known for its burrowing abilities.

name: Dugtrio
desc: Dugtrio is a Ground-type Pokémon. It's the evolved form of Diglett.

name: Meowth
desc: Meowth is a Normal-type Pokémon known for its love of coins.

name: Persian
desc: Persian is a Normal-type Pokémon. It's the evolved form of Meowth.

name: Psyduck
desc: Psyduck is a Water-type Pokémon known for its constant headaches.

name: Golduck
desc: Golduck is a Water-type Pokémon. It's the evolved form of Psyduck.

name: Mankey
desc: Mankey is a Fighting-type Pokémon known for its short temper.

name: Primeape
desc: Primeape is a Fighting-type Pokémon. It's the evolved form of Mankey.

name: Growlithe
desc: Growlithe is a Fire-type Pokémon known for its loyalty and courage.

name: Arcanine
desc: Arcanine is a Fire-type Pokémon. It's the evolved form of Growlithe.

name: Poliwag
desc: Poliwag is a Water-type Pokémon known for its swirling pattern on its belly.

name: Poliwhirl
desc: Poliwhirl is the evolved form of Poliwag. It has a tadpole-like appearance.

name: Poliwrath
desc: Poliwrath is a Water/Fighting-type Pokémon. It's the evolved form of Poliwhirl.

name: Abra
desc: Abra is a Psychic-type Pokémon known for its teleportation abilities.

name: Kadabra
desc: Kadabra is the evolved form of Abra. It's known for its spoon-bending tricks.

name: Alakazam
desc: Alakazam is a Psychic-type Pokémon known for its high intelligence. It can Mega Evolve for even greater mental abilities.

name: Machop
desc: Machop is a Fighting-type Pokémon known for its powerful muscles.

name: Machoke
desc: Machoke is the evolved form of Machop. It's incredibly strong but lacks finesse.

name: Machamp
desc: Machamp is a Fighting-type Pokémon known for its impressive four arms. It's the evolved form of Machoke.

name: Bellsprout
desc: Bellsprout is a Grass/Poison-type Pokémon. It has a plant-like appearance and a bell-shaped head.

name: Weepinbell
desc: Weepinbell is the evolved form of Bellsprout. It's known for its sharp teeth and vine-like appendages.

name: Victreebel
desc: Victreebel is a Grass/Poison-type Pokémon. It's the evolved form of Weepinbell.

name: Tentacool
desc: Tentacool is a Water/Poison-type Pokémon known for its tentacles.

name: Tentacruel
desc: Tentacruel is a Water/Poison-type Pokémon. It's the evolved form of Tentacool.

name: Geodude
desc: Geodude is a Rock/Ground-type Pokémon known for its rocky appearance.

name: Graveler
desc: Graveler is the evolved form of Geodude. It's known for rolling down mountains.

name: Golem
desc: Golem is a Rock/Ground-type Pokémon known for its sturdy body. It's the evolved form of Graveler.

name: Ponyta
desc: Ponyta is a Fire-type Pokémon known for its fiery mane.

name: Rapidash
desc: Rapidash is a Fire-type Pokémon. It's the evolved form of Ponyta and known for its incredible speed.

name: Slowpoke
desc: Slowpoke is a Water/Psychic-type Pokémon known for its slow and absent-minded nature.

name: Slowbro
desc: Slowbro is a Water/Psychic-type Pokémon. It's the evolved form of Slowpoke and has a Shellder attached to its tail.
